text: By the Bluest of Seas (, U samogo sinego morya) is a 1936 Soviet comedy movie directed by Boris Barnet.У самого синего моряЦирк с рыбаками It stars Yelena Kuzmina, Nikolai Kryuchkov, and Lev Sverdlin. ==Actors== * Yelena Kuzmina - Mariya * Nikolai Kryuchkov - Alyosha * Lev Sverdlin - Yussuf == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1936 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Boris Barnet
title: By the Bluest of Seas
